titleStmt.title: Three speeches made to the Right Honorable the Lord Maior, aldermen, and Common-Council of London, by the Lord Whitlock, Lord Fleetwood, Lord Disbrowe. At Guild-Hall, on Tuesday November the 8th. 1659.
titleStmt.author: Whitlocke, Bulstrode, 1605-1675 or 6.
Fleetwood, Charles, d. 1692.
Desborough, John, 1608-1680.

notesStmt.note: The words "Lord Whitlock, .. Lord Disbrowe." are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
